snippet: The Japanese advertising powerhouse Dentsu, which has struggled to expand internationally, made a big leap into Western markets with its deal for Aegis, which is based in London.
abstract: The Japanese advertising powerhouse Dentsu, which has struggled to expand internationally, made a big leap into Western markets with its deal for Aegis, which is based in London.

headline.main: Dentsu of Japan to Buy Aegis of Britain for About $5 Billion
headline.print_headline: The Ad Agency Dentsu To Buy Aegis for $5 Billion
